descriptionHtml:
I was a little bored from skyrim vanilla enchantement and think those interesting customed one in some other mod are simply too powerfull. Well ... mine may still be too powerfull also...
[youtube]pElu-wKgzso[/youtube] 
To tell you the truth, building the bad effect on the armor enchantement was more enjoyable than the good effect and the effect on the sword XD
Description:  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-Tornado Enchantement on weapon
A simple enchantement that stagger and push away your target.
Push the target if it's staggered, or if you're doing a powerfull attack.

-Soul eater Enchantement on armor, shield, ring or necklace
A enchantement that allow you to absorb magic spells (and then recharging your mana) when blocking.

-Add an unenchanted woodless archmage robe ingame selled by Enthir at the magical academy.
------------------------------
The soul eater enchantement will also eat your life. It is such an overpowered enchantement that i tried to reduce the semi god mod it gives to the user, not sure i succeed.
There is 2 way to put the item holding this enchantement without getting the bad effect.
I think you can easily find the first one by reading the description, the second one is to have some kind of magical protection.
Will you find the trick ? (o'.'o)

Those enchantement are unlimited, so you can give to your follower a weapon holding the tornado enchantement without worrying about recharging his weapon. Of course if you put a second enchantement on the weapon, the second one will add a charge bar that can be depleted so the weapon will need to be recharged.

Anyone who die while wearing an item having the soul eater enchantement will desintegrate and vanish from existence, nothing left behind.

Where to find them ? -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The items are inside the chest in front of High Hrothgar

Compatibility -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-May conflict with mod altering Enthir sell list if you use the version adding the unenchanted woodless archmage robe.
-May conflict with any mod altering the chest in front of High Hrothgar.

Installation --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
As usual, put the files inside the game data folder.
Uninstallation ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Be sure noone is wearing an item having the soul eater enchantement before uninstalling the mod or the script related to this enchantement may continue to run.
author: Kctsu
